title: I Was Diagnosed With Autism Today
body:
Never even realized it, but sure enough, first game of the day. It was actually my top laner that caught it, right after he died to a gank. I appreciate that he didn't try to sugar coat it, just gave me the diagnosis. He said "Jarvan, you are autistic". In that moment, my life changed forever.

It was pretty tough news to receive, but I think I'll be alright. I've been joining a lot of support groups and reading up on some literature.

Keep me in your thoughts and prayers.

Edit: This got a lot of upvotes for some reason, so im adding the disclaimer in no way shape or form is this meant to be derrogatory to people with autism. Love you guys.

replies.body:
It's like the conversation that helped me find out I was gay. 

"Are you gay?"

"No."

"Do your parents know you're gay?"

"No... wait--!"

But it was too late. I was gay now.

Lol, I hate those trap questions. Another bad one:

"If a gay guy jumped on your back, would you beat him off?"

Horrible. :(
Where's the trap ?
"Beat him off" is a euphemism for a... certain thing
if you say you wouldn't, it'd mean you enjoy having a gay guy on your back,if you'd say you would,it'd mean... well... let the context say it for you

XD at the first i didn't understand it cause of "Beat him off". We don't have this expression here (in french). 

Ty for explain
I thought you were going next level in the joke and were acting like "so... what's the problem ;) <3  "
{{champion:44}} You should give him a _smash_
YES
Wait.. Is this memes & games?
i gave you a like, i hope my prayer goes through
*Appreciative Screech*
1 like = 1 prayer
So, are you going to one-trick {{champion:11}} or {{champion:23}} ?

Worse {{champion:157}} {{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}{{champion:157}}
Hey, we Autistic people aren't THAT stupid.
Yeah. We're not assholes. 3:<

Join the club

Autistic and proud wear it like a true champ.

They are just jealous of your social skills

You see autists are excellent at filtering out all irrelevant social imput and will only respond to stuff that is worthy enough of their attention

They are the true alpha males

The rest are just jealous beta's
Omega males unite! One day, we too might be betas.

As an actual autist, whenever someone uses it as an insult i know it is inspired by ignorance. If you truly understood what autism is, you would realize its not really an insult - its as much a disability as your skin colour is.

That we're a little different, or unusual, doesnt mean we're worse - or better - than normal people like you. We're just a little weird. :)

Well to begin with it is kind of strange to use such a nondescript term as autistic as an insult

Since autism can mean lots of different things since it is a spectrum disorder so there is a huge difference between one end and the other end of the spectrum

Well I guess in the end it is just ignorance
Same with cancer. There are cancers that have a survival rate similar to the normal population and there are cancers that kill you within 3 months.
Was this person an approved doctor with a degree to deliver those news?
He was playing Doctor Mundo, checks out.
Okay, I'm not sure if this is a joke or you're serious... You got it from a player after all.
Worst part is.... He was playing Dr Mundo...
Get well soon buddy. <3
I have ASD and I and I approve of this message. Laughed my ass off..
The world needs more people like you, this community too
That rhyme was unintentional
Welcome to the endless ranks.

I have relatives with autism, mostly low in the spectrum... but it was enough to upset me when people say 'youre autistic' as an insult in a game. its very insensitive and unnecessary.

i recommend reporting anyone who uses that type of hate speech and write what they said.
Despite this post I agree, calling some autistic as an insult like its a bad thing is wrong and deserves a report. That was not the intent of this post to make anyone feel bad.

> [{quoted}](name=FDS Desperado,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZIBIpVwg,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-08-30T19:40:49.857+0000)
>
> Never even realized it, but sure enough, first game of the day. It was actually my top laner that caught it, right after he died to a gank. I appreciate that he didn't try to sugar coat it, just gave me the diagnosis. He said "Jarvan, you are autistic". In that moment, my life changed forever.
> 
> It was pretty tough news to receive, but I think I&#039;ll be alright. I&#039;ve been joining a lot of support groups and reading up on some literature.
> 
> Keep me in your thoughts and prayers.
> 
> Edit: This got a lot of upvotes for some reason, so im adding the disclaimer in no way shape or form is this meant to be derrogatory to people with autism. Love you guys.

I like the satire that you used here and there's nothing wrong with the thread. However, in the future, these threads should be posted in [Memes and Games](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes). With that said, go ahead and have fun here!
Thank you kind sir
I've had autism ever since i began playing ranked. My IQ dropped to like negative a fucking biliion.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Being autistic would probably improve your IQ, fool.
eh, it's a spectrum. like, look at me, I'm pretty smart, but I'm specifically high-functioning autistic, and that's... not everyone.
https://media.giphy.com/media/3otPoMCsSCuwAWXJJu/giphy.gif

Hey man, I was called "gay" for camping a lane. At first I rejected it, but it turns out that I've been gay this whole time.
I came out to my parents, they weren't too thrilled but they still love me.

Now me and my top laner have been together for almost two weeks. Life is amazing, I couldn't have asked for a better partner.

As a guy who has high-functioning autism (Asperger or something, oddly enough they don't use term anymore), I just roll with it and say "Yep, that the gist of it". It turns the insult into a joke, taking power away from them and putting the ball in your court. Also, if you make a comeback, you can just say that your enemy laner lost to a guy with autism :)
I think some forms of autism like aspergers or schizoid help with computer games, you will be able to play more since you don't need to go out and socialize as much and can focus on LoL.
you should now be a golden champ.. guilds will want you..  rainman
{{champion:59}} Jarvan IV is been diagnosed with Autism?

> disclaimer

Legit autistic guy here, the only people offended by autism insults are people without autism who are looking to get offended for someone else.

> [{quoted}](name=Meeks011,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZIBIpVwg,comment-id=0031,timestamp=2017-09-01T16:29:13.560+0000)
>
> Legit autistic guy here, the only people offended by autism insults are people without autism who are looking to get offended for someone else.

I don't think you can just decide what autistic people can get offended about though lol
I been diagnosed with autism every time I open up league of legends
I thought u played Yasuo. U are still normal dude.
